tasks.title: Add support for secure credential storage using 'keyring' crate
evidence: Currently, passwords and API tokens are stored in plain text in config.json.
Using the system keyring is a security best practice for CLI tools.
plan: Add the 'keyring' crate to crates/config dependencies.
Modify PersistedState to optionally store a key identifier instead of the secret.
Implement logic to fetch/store secrets in the system keyring (macOS Keychain, Windows Credential Vault, etc.).

tasks.title: Implement 'Tail Internal Logs' command/screen
evidence: Administrators often need to monitor Splunk's own logs for troubleshooting.
A 'tail -f' like experience for index=_internal would be highly valuable.
plan: Implement a streaming search client that polls for new results in real-time.
Add a CLI command 'splunk logs --tail'.
Add a TUI screen that shows a live-updating list of internal logs.

tasks.title: Add search progress bar to the TUI Search screen
evidence: Long-running searches in the TUI provide no visual feedback on progress.
Splunk provides search job progress via the REST API.
plan: Modify the search execution to periodically poll for job status while running.
Update App state with the current progress percentage.

plan: Add a selected_jobs: HashSet<String> to track multiple SIDs.

Update 'c' and 'd' actions to apply to all selected jobs with a single confirmation.

plan: Replace the simple Paragraph with a custom widget or List that only processes visible results.

tasks.title: Improve CLI output for CSV/XML formats with better nesting handling
evidence: Flattening complex JSON objects for CSV/XML can lead to data loss or confusing output.
Better handling of nested structures would improve the utility of these formats for scripts.
plan: Implement a recursive flattener for nested JSON objects in the CsvFormatter.
Use dot-notation for nested keys (e.g., 'user.name').
Improve XML structure for complex nested fields.
